## Overview
To predict the season a piece of dialogue from the show `Friends` is using natural language processing in predictive modeling.

## Table of Contents
- `data_splits`: the split and folded data
- `figures`: any visuals (plots and tables) used in the memo
- QMD/HTML file: memo giving a rundown of the lab
- `r_scripts`: all the R code used
- `recipes`: basic recipe using NLP
- `results`: fitted models
